name: RockyCat
description: RockyCat ($RKC) is a community-driven memecoin inspired by resilience, fun, and meme culture, built to empower underdogs in crypto. Beyond memes, RockyCat has bold future plans, including integration with the Ice Open Network decentralized social media platform (Online+), where all revenue generated will be burned to strengthen the token’s value. $RKC will also play a role in powering upcoming utilities across the Tabofins finance hub, Yalabit P2P app, and RafTech ecosystem apps, creating a bridge between meme culture and real blockchain use cases. RockyCat combines humor, community, and long-term vision to become more than just a meme — it’s a movement with utility.
